about_the_game:
• Sharp movement mechanics (Strafe, dash dodge, wall jump, rocket boosting, and bunny hop), allowing you to keep building momentum at any time.

  • Weapons for all aiming styles (Tracking, Flicking, Projectiles).

  • Many maps and game modes (JMP, Team DM / FFA, CTF*, KOTH*)

  • Create servers easily

  • Server browsing for server made public

  • Text chat

  • Importable sprays

  • Customizable players outlines *

  • Customizable weapon skins *

* Game modes and functionnality currently in development.

Bullet Speed takes inspiration from early Source games and classics like Quake / Unreal.

This game is all in about the raw, unfiltered joy of running, gunning, and outsmarting your opponents in meticulously designed arenas that serve as the canvas for your clips.

Movement isn't just a means to an end; it's an art form. Strafe, dash dodge, wall jump, rocket boosting, and bunny hop your way to victory, all while unleashing a barrage of bullets that would make even the most seasoned players sweat.

Whether you're a competitive fragger or a casual gamer looking for a quick adrenaline fix, Bullet Speed is your ticket to unadulterated fun. Put on a good playlist, grab your favorite weapon and jump in to let the bullets fly.
detailed_description:
• Sharp movement mechanics (Strafe, dash dodge, wall jump, rocket boosting, and bunny hop), allowing you to keep building momentum at any time.

  • Weapons for all aiming styles (Tracking, Flicking, Projectiles).

  • Many maps and game modes (JMP, Team DM / FFA, CTF*, KOTH*)

  • Create servers easily

  • Importable sprays

  • Customizable players outlines *

  • Customizable weapon skins *

* Game modes and functionnality currently in development.

This game is all in about the raw, unfiltered joy of running, gunning, and outsmarting your opponents in meticulously designed arenas that serve as the canvas for your clips.

Movement isn't just a means to an end; it's an art form. Strafe, dash dodge, wall jump, rocket boosting, and bunny hop your way to victory, all while unleashing a barrage of bullets that would make even the most seasoned players sweat.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500 / Intel Core i3-12100 (2Ghz 4 core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan / OpenGL3
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600 / Intel Core i5-12400 (2.5Ghz 6 core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 550 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650 (4go DDR5)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan / OpenGL3

short_description: Bullet speed is a lightning fast paced arena shooter seeing blood fueled robotic avatars cracked on adrenaline shooting each other. Move fast. Kill with style. Repeat.
